name: Théo
text: Thank you so much for your serious and clarity. [...] The rest is interesting also, but the way you explained my relationship to time and the events of the 20th december are the most impressive! (translated from French)

name: Jo
text: Zoee was so insightful and was able to give me perspective on my strengths and areas to need mindful of with some practical strategies to take with me. I thoroughly enjoyed it.

name: Premalatha
text: Her explanations are easy to understand...get to learn more about myself in a different light and way to improve for betterment.

name: Anaïs
text: Your reading was amazing! I loved to watch it and it was so well explained and detailed. (translated from French)

name: Léa
text: [...] it’s really crazy but you said so many things that are totally true about me! It’s amazing! It was so interesting and I really recognize myself. Really, you did an amazing job. (translated from French)
